attributes.action: call a general election to restore trust in politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses scandal has tainted all MPs and the House of Commons. The only way to restore trust is to ask the public to vote now for politicians they can trust. Only then will we have a Commons which has the moral authority to lead the country on the crucial questions of the economy, liberty and national security.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
